product.longDescription: Similar color and habit of the Benary's Giant Series but will produce 4–6" single, semidouble, and double flowers. Cut-and-come-again flower, yielding multiple cuts over the season. A mix of yellows, roses, scarlet, green, orange, pink, red, purple, and coral. Ht. 40–50". Avg. 3,400 seeds/oz. Packet: 50 seeds.
product.shortDescription: An absolute must for the cutting garden.

Giant Dahlia Flowered Mix Zinnia Seed

Product ID:1879.111879

Similar color and habit of the Benary's Giant Series but will produce 4–6" single, semidouble, and double flowers. Cut-and-come-again flower, yielding multiple cuts over the season. A mix of yellows, roses, scarlet, green, orange, pink, red, purple, and coral. Ht. 40–50". Avg. 3,400 seeds/oz. Packet: 50 seeds.
